ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Provides functions to analyse overdispersed counts or proportions.  These functions should be considered as complements to more sophisticated methods such as generalized estimating equations (GEE) or generalized linear mixed effect models (GLMM). aods3 is an S3 re-implementation of the deprecated S4 package aod.

Provides functions to analyse overdispersed counts or proportions.  These functions should be considered as complements to more sophisticated methods such as generalized estimating equations (GEE) or generalized linear mixed effect models (GLMM). aods3 is an S3 re-implementation of the deprecated S4 package aod.

name: r-aods3
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.6" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-aods3
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/aods3_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/aods3/aods3_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 1fc6d3cd951072a65a1983eeef2fd6dd79cf9dc2e40d753b49709f7103c7b1db

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('aods3')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('aods3')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=aods3
  license: GPL-2.0-or-later
  summary: Provides functions to analyse overdispersed counts or proportions.  These functions should be considered as complements to more sophisticated methods such as generalized estimating equations (GEE) or generalized linear mixed effect models (GLMM). aods3 is an S3 re-implementation of the deprecated S4 package aod.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: aods3
# Version: 0.4-1.2
# Title: Analysis of Overdispersed Data using S3 Methods
# Author: Matthieu Lesnoff <matthieu.lesnoff@cirad.fr> and Renaud Lancelot <renaud.lancelot@cirad.fr>
# Maintainer: Renaud Lancelot <renaud.lancelot@cirad.fr>
# Depends: R (>= 3.0.0), stats
# Suggests: boot, lme4
# Description: Provides functions to analyse overdispersed counts or proportions.  These functions should be considered as complements to more sophisticated methods such as generalized estimating equations (GEE) or generalized linear mixed effect models (GLMM). aods3 is an S3 re-implementation of the deprecated S4 package aod.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# LazyData: yes
# Packaged: 2022-07-08 09:19:23 UTC; hornik
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2022-07-08 09:25:25 UTC
